title: The Dangerous stranger
creator_credit: Sid Davis and Sid Davis Productions
brief_description: Produced with the co-operation of Inglewood Police Department and Inglewood Unified School District. Designed to impress children with the need to be on guard against molesters. Dramatises places and circumstances under which the child may encounter dangerous stragers under unsupervised conditions and indicates how to avois potential molesters. Human interest, common sense and humour are used, but fear is scrupulously avoided. (Suitable for elementary grades)
